articles.content: BCCI ends speculations, retains Rahul Dravid as India's head coach alongside support staff

articles.title: Arrogance and disrespect - Mitchell Johnson takes aim at David Warner as retirement looms - The Cricketer
articles.description: The former Australia fast-bowler says Warner has still never really owned the ball-tampering scandal which emerged in 2018 and led to a 12-month ban from cricket. Selected in the 14-player squad for the first Pakistan Test, his final bow beckons
